snippet: The Royals declined their option for next season on Butler, their designated hitter, making him a free agent for the first time in his eight-year career.
abstract: Kansas City Royals decline their option for 2015 on designated hitter Billy Butler, making him free agent for first time in his eight-year career; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Royals declined their option for next season on Butler, their designated hitter, making him a free agent for the first time in his eight-year career.

headline.main: Kansas City Royals Pass on Billy Butler
